nodes.text: The Bes Ber Bikade sector, also known as the Three-Besh sector, was a sector in the Expansion Region. It contained the planets Borkyne, Dura-Kahn, Epica, KyLessia, Roona and Troxar. The sector was located in the southern portion of the region and bordered the Andirma sector, the Arc d'Stot sector, the Rocantor sector, the Hakartha sector, the Vulcusion sector, and the Tregillis sector.
